definition: a book or manuscript consisting of large sheets of paper folded in the middle to make two leaves or four pages
details:
noun
- a book or manuscript consisting of large sheets of paper folded in the middle to make two leaves or four pages
= example: a book or manuscript consisting of large sheets of paper folded in the middle to make two leaves or four pages
- a sheet of any written or printed material, especially in a manuscript or book
= example: a sheet of any written or printed material, especially in a manuscript or book
= synonyms: leaf
- the system of numbering pages
= synonyms: pagination, page number, paging
